name: Boku wa Plarail Untenshi: Shinkansen & Joukikikansha-Hen
overview: Using the Wii remote control, operate the mascon and brake lever to drive the plarail. The game can be played by one or two people! When playing with two people, you can use two Wii remote control, one can drive and the other can do cooperative play with other operations such as lights and wipers. In this game, you operate a N 700 series Shinkansen bullet train, stopping at the station to take and leave customers. It can run at speeds of up to 300 km/h. You can also play with a C12 steam locomotive driven by steam. In the game you burn coal to move the steam locomotive. The game begins with the "Hijirai Rashin" mode, and as you advance the game, new modes will be unlocked. Depending on the mode you can also change the viewpoint, you can also see the mountains and the towering plarail. When you clear the game, you can receive a cool "Plarail Card" that you can see in the game. Play for fun and let's arrange all 24 kinds of Plarail cards.
